lead_paragraph: Eric Lindros knew exactly what day and time the Hockey Hall of Fame would call. He was just hoping his phone would ring this time after six years of silence.

headline.print_headline: Lindros' Wait Over as He Headlines Hockey Hall of Fame Class
headline.main: Lindros' Wait Over as He Headlines Hockey Hall of Fame Class

snippet: Eric Lindros knew exactly what day and time the Hockey Hall of Fame would call. He was just hoping his phone would ring this time after six years of silence....
